mapper.sql: item_id, type_id, material_efficiency, time_efficiency, runs, quantity, location_id, location_flag, owner_id
mapper.insert:
insert into blueprints (item_id, type_id, material_efficiency, time_efficiency, runs, quantity, location_id, location_flag, owner_id) values
(#{item.itemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.materialEfficiency,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.timeEfficiency,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.runs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.quantity,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.locationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.locationFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ownerId,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
mapper.select: select bt.item_id,bt.type_id,it.type_name,bt.material_efficiency,bt.time_efficiency,bt.runs,ass.is_blueprint_copy,bt.location_id,bt.location_flag,bt.quantity,ec.character_name,bt.owner_id from blueprints as bt left join assets ass on bt.item_id = ass.item_id left join inv_types it on bt.type_id = it.type_id left join eve_character ec on bt.owner_id = ec.character_id where bt.owner_id = #{id}
